org.trianacode.gui.main.imp

Class TrianaTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.trianacode.gui.main.imp.TrianaTool
              • org.trianacode.gui.main.imp.TrianaTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, TrianaColorConstants, TaskComponent, TaskListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainTrianaTask

    public class TrianaTask
extends TrianaTool
implements TaskListener, TaskComponent
    TrianaTask is an abstract class which defines a methods which apply to all TrianaTasks. They all have a name, a colour and they are all double clickable. These events associated with TrianaTasks are handled in ToolHandler
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

        public static double PROCESS_LED_WIDTH_FACTOR

      • PROCESS_LED_HEIGHT_FACTOR

        public static double PROCESS_LED_HEIGHT_FACTOR

      • processled

        protected boolean processled
        A a flag indicating whether the processing led is shown in the middle of the icon. When it is on a red light is shown on the icon which means that the unit is processing the data. It goes off when the data has been processed.
